verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came מֵאַ֣חֲרֵי <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass after this כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> this וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> prepared לוֹ֙ אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <S%H53><s%> that Absalom מֶרְכָּבָ֖ה <S%H4818><s%> him chariots וְסֻסִ֑ים <S%H5483><s%> and horses וַחֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men רָצִ֥ים <S%H7323><s%> to run לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וְהִשְׁכִּים֙ <S%H7925><s%> rose up early אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <S%H53><s%> And Absalom וְעָמַ֕ד <S%H5975><s%> and stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> beside דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way הַשָּׁ֑עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate וַיְהִ֡י <S%H1961><s%> had כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and it was [so] that when any man אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יִהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> had לּוֹ־ רִיב֩ <S%H7379><s%> that had a controversy לָב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king לַמִּשְׁפָּ֗ט <S%H4941><s%> for judgment וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> called אַבְשָׁל֤וֹם <S%H53><s%> then Absalom אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> to him וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto him and said אֵֽי־ <S%H335><s%> Of what מִזֶּ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> he עִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> city אַ֔תָּה <S%H859><s%> you וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> [art] thou? And he said מֵאַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> [is] of one שִׁבְטֵֽי־ <S%H7626><s%> of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> Thy servant

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> then אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <S%H53><s%> And Absalom רְאֵ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> unto him See דְבָרֶ֖ךָ <S%H1697><s%> thy matters טוֹבִ֣ים <S%H2896><s%> [are] good וּנְכֹחִ֑ים <S%H5228><s%> and right וְשֹׁמֵ֥עַ <S%H8085><s%> to hear אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> no לְךָ֖ מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> but [there is] no man [deputed] of the king

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <S%H53><s%> Absalom מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Oh יְשִׂמֵ֥נִי <S%H7760><s%> moreover Oh that I were made שֹׁפֵ֖ט <S%H8199><s%> judge בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land וְעָלַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> and יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> might come כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that every man אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יִהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> has לּוֹ־ רִ֥יב <S%H7379><s%> which hath any suit וּמִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> or cause וְהִצְדַּקְתִּֽיו׃ <S%H6663><s%> unto me and I would do him justice

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become בִּקְרָב־ <S%H7126><s%> came nigh אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And it was [so] that when any man לְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֖ת <S%H7812><s%> [to him] to do him obeisance ל֑וֹ וְשָׁלַ֧ח <S%H7971><s%> he put forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָד֛וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand וְהֶחֱזִ֥יק <S%H2388><s%> and took ל֖וֹ וְנָ֥שַׁק <S%H5401><s%> him and kissed לֽוֹ׃

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did אַבְשָׁל֜וֹם <S%H53><s%> Absalom כַּדָּבָ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> And on this manner הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> to all Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יָבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> that came לַמִּשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> for judgment אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king וַיְגַנֵּב֙ <S%H1589><s%> stole אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <S%H53><s%> so Absalom אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֵ֖ב <S%H3820><s%> the hearts אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> of the men יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פ

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> came מִקֵּ֖ץ <S%H7093><s%> And it came to pass after אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> forty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַבְשָׁלוֹם֙ <S%H53><s%> that Absalom אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king אֵ֣לֲכָה <S%H1980><s%> go נָּ֗א <S%H4994><s%> Please וַאֲשַׁלֵּ֛ם <S%H7999><s%> and pay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִדְרִ֛י <S%H5088><s%> my vow אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָדַ֥רְתִּי <S%H5087><s%> which I have vowed לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בְּחֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H2275><s%> in Hebron

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נֵ֙דֶר֙ <S%H5088><s%> a vow נָדַ֣ר <S%H5087><s%> vowed עַבְדְּךָ֔ <S%H5650><s%> For thy servant בְּשִׁבְתִּ֥י <S%H3427><s%> while I abode בִגְשׁ֛וּר <S%H1650><s%> at Geshur בַּאֲרָ֖ם <S%H758><s%> in Syria לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If [יְשִׁיב כ] (יָשֹׁ֨וב <S%H7725><s%> shall indeed ק) יְשִׁיבֵ֤נִי <S%H7725><s%> shall indeed יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> If the LORD יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> indeed to Jerusalem וְעָבַדְתִּ֖י <S%H5647><s%> then I will serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <S%H559><s%> said ל֥וֹ הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go בְּשָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> in peace וַיָּ֖קָם <S%H6965><s%> So he arose וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went חֶבְרֽוֹנָה׃ <S%H2275><s%> to Hebron פ

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אַבְשָׁלוֹם֙ <S%H53><s%> But Absalom מְרַגְּלִ֔ים <S%H7270><s%> spies בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> throughout all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying כְּשָׁמְעֲכֶם֙ <S%H8085><s%> As soon as ye hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the sound הַשֹּׁפָ֔ר <S%H7782><s%> of the trumpet וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <S%H559><s%> then ye shall say מָלַ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigneth אַבְשָׁל֖וֹם <S%H53><s%> Absalom בְּחֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H2275><s%> in Hebron

וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אַבְשָׁל֗וֹם <S%H53><s%> And with Absalom הָלְכ֞וּ <S%H1980><s%> went מָאתַ֤יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> men מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> out of Jerusalem קְרֻאִ֖ים <S%H7121><s%> [that were] called וְהֹלְכִ֣ים <S%H1980><s%> and they went לְתֻמָּ֑ם <S%H8537><s%> in their simplicity וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> and they knew כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> not any thing

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אַ֠בְשָׁלוֹם <S%H53><s%> And Absalom אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחִיתֹ֨פֶל <S%H302><s%> for Ahithophel הַגִּֽילֹנִ֜י <S%H1526><s%> the Gilonite יוֹעֵ֣ץ <S%H3289><s%> counsellor דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> David's מֵֽעִירוֹ֙ <S%H5892><s%> from his city מִגִּלֹ֔ה <S%H1542><s%> [even] from Giloh בְּזָבְח֖וֹ <S%H2076><s%> while he offered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַזְּבָחִ֑ים <S%H2077><s%> sacrifices וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become הַקֶּ֙שֶׁר֙ <S%H7195><s%> And the conspiracy אַמִּ֔ץ <S%H533><s%> was strong וְהָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> for the people הוֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> continually וָרָ֖ב <S%H7227><s%> increased אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אַבְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H53><s%> with Absalom

וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> And there came הַמַּגִּ֔יד <S%H5046><s%> a messenger אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> to David לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become לֶב־ <S%H3820><s%> The hearts אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> are after אַבְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H53><s%> Absalom

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּ֠וִד <S%H1732><s%> And David לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all עֲבָדָ֨יו <S%H5650><s%> unto all his servants אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֤וֹ <S%H854><s%> at בִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> that [were] with him at Jerusalem ק֣וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> Arise וְנִבְרָ֔חָה <S%H1272><s%> and let us flee כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> for none תִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לָּ֥נוּ פְלֵיטָ֖ה <S%H6413><s%> for we shall not [else] escape מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from אַבְשָׁל֑וֹם <S%H53><s%> Absalom מַהֲר֣וּ <S%H4116><s%> make speed לָלֶ֗כֶת <S%H1980><s%> Go פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> or יְמַהֵ֤ר <S%H4116><s%> us suddenly וְהִשִּׂגָ֙נוּ֙ <S%H5381><s%> lest he overtake וְהִדִּ֤יחַ <S%H5080><s%> and bring עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5921><s%> and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> evil וְהִכָּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> upon us and smite הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> the city לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> with the edge חָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> of the sword

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> said עַבְדֵֽי־ <S%H5650><s%> servants הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king's אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king כְּכֹ֧ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יִבְחַ֛ר <S%H977><s%> shall appoint אֲדֹנִ֥י <S%H113><s%> [are ready to do] whatsoever my lord הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> Behold thy servants

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> went forth הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בֵּית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> and all his household בְּרַגְלָ֑יו <S%H7272><s%> after וַיַּעֲזֹ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> left הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> him And the king אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> עֶ֧שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ten נָשִׁ֛ים <S%H802><s%> women פִּֽלַגְשִׁ֖ים <S%H6370><s%> [which were] concubines לִשְׁמֹ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> to keep הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> the house

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> went forth הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people בְּרַגְלָ֑יו <S%H7272><s%> after וַיַּעַמְד֖וּ <S%H5975><s%> him and tarried בֵּ֥ית הַמֶּרְחָֽק׃ <S%H1023><s%> Beth-ham-Merchak
